title: This mirrored alarm clock will definitely catch your eye. And it’s only $22.
content:
Macworld

We’re all about multitasking these days. And since your smartphone probably handles the wake-up duties your old alarm clock used to perform, a clock has to bring something new to the game if it wants to keep its place on your nightstand. So, what if your new alarm clock doubles as a handy mirror?

This cool mirrored digital alarm clock can certainly hold its own, offering style and substance on your bedside table. It’s now under $25 for a limited time.

Boasting a large LED time display, you can set your preferred brightness option to enjoy a clear reading in either a 12- or 24-hour time mode. Speaking of large, the snooze button is prominent, so you can say goodbye to fumbling in the dark to snooze your alarm. You can even choose your snooze time from anywhere between 5 and 60 minutes.

Plus, this alarm clock sports a pair of USB ports, making it easy for you to plug in your iPhone, iPad, or other tech while you get shuteye. All this alarm clock’s functionality is also matched by a sleek mirrored surface. The face is so prominent that you can even use it as a bedside mirror when it’s turned off or unplugged.

Grab this Mirrored Digital Alarm Clock With Dual USB Ports for just $21.99 for a limited time.
